channel.title: Welcome to My Blog! on Jaan
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to My Blog! on Jaan

item.title: SSDs Go Brrr
item.description: Most of my experience with computers involve passed down laptops or unused computers at home. I’ve always assumed that they’re just painfully slow because of the CPU and stuck with it. Since I only code on the desktop and watch some videos from time to time, it never bothered me. Up until I got into Android development (with Kotlin) again, after getting tired of Flutter’s limitations, that’s when I notice how much of a bottleneck the hard drive speed is.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Jaan, a self taught programmer. At the moment I’m trying to get into app development by learning native Android and from time to time I code in Rust. I got into coding after I got curious about Linux from the show Mr. Robot 6 years ago. The first months, I’ve probably distro-hopped more than my fingers could count. At the moment I’m a happy user of KDE Neon. This is my blog.
